## UserBDTO class

Backend DTO for user. Based on [UserModel](./clm-core.usermodel.md) The instance [userBDTOInstance](./clm-core.userbdtoinstance.md) is provided. Uses as default [MariaAdapter](./clm-core.mariaadapter.md) for persistence layer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class UserBDTO extends BaseBackendDTO<UserModel> 
```
